message: I am thinking...: The current solution has performance issues due to the O(N) complexity of checking if a substring is a good string for each query. To improve this, I can use a more efficient approach by maintaining a count of flips and checking the parity of the indices instead of extracting substrings. This will allow me to handle the queries in O(1) time after an initial setup. I will implement this optimized solution.
